data.text: @SenMikeLee They don't want to do the right thing.
@SenMikeLee Republicans don’t have the votes to end the filibuster either.

@SenMikeLee While I appreciate your valiant efforts, I wish you'd actually explained why @LeaderJohnThune and @SenMcConnell won't do it. 

I don't suppose you could convince them that the deep state would go so far as to stage an insurrection and rig an election to overthrow President Trump.
@SenMikeLee @LeaderJohnThune DO YOUR JOB & PASS THE SAVE AMERICA ACT ‼️
@SenMikeLee Take over the Senate for one month @VP and get things done.

@SenMikeLee Imagine the wrath from Americans toward @GOP that failed to pass the SAVE AMERICA ACT and gave the control of America to the radical left Democrats. @SenateGOP @HouseGOP @LeaderJohnThune @SpeakerJohnson
@SenMikeLee YEAH, I  WANT TO HEAR YOU TALK ABOUT THIS, https://t.co/aeolAxCaUA
